title: OTAs and Crucial Questions + Draft Pick Trading, Super Heart! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 5/24
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of questions answered and tough decisions made! Andy, Mike, and Jason discuss trading picks in redraft leagues, strategies in 14 team leagues, and tons more! Plus, the latest NFL News and reports from OTAs! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for May 24th, 2022.

Final week to pre-order the 2022 UDK at UltimateDraftKit.com! Get the lowest price before June 1st launch

(03:50) - Quick Question - Trading Draft Picks
(06:50) - NFL News, OTAs
(14:10) - Mailbag
(15:15) - Dynasty Trade: Mark Andrews, T.J. Hockenson
(18:45) - 14 Team Leagues
(20:10) - Pick One: Chase Edmonds, CEH, A.J. Dillon
(27:00) - Cooper Kupp 1.01?
(30:40) - Jameis Winston
(33:05) - Dynasty: Michael Pittman or Tee Higgins?
(36:00) - Lamar Jackson in the 5th round?
(37:45) - Best place to draft Trey Lance?
(41:05) - UDK Team Import Features
(41:55) - D’Andre Swift or Javonte Williams?


Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
